page.title: 08EAST COKER VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: The original{Victorian building}now houses three infant classes.The other {school buildings have all been added over the years.Two classrooms,the hall and the dining hall were all built after the war.Our toilet block is the original building in the middle of the playground.The state of the buildings is poor and it is recognised that we need some form of remodelling. The{staff}is made up of Head plus 9 class teachers;of these 3 are male. The{children}come from the villages of East and North Coker,Hardington, East Chinnock,Pendomer,Halstock and the outskirts of Yeovil.About 75 children come to school by{bus,}the remainder either{walk}or are brought {by car. We have our own{school kitchen}which provides meals for 170 children per day.
